mapper.sql: cmt.id AS cmt_id, cmt.content_type AS cmt_content_type, cmt.content_id AS cmt_content_id, cmt.user_id AS cmt_user_id, cmt.body AS cmt_body, cmt.status AS cmt_status, cmt.reg_dttm AS cmt_reg_dttm, cmt.up_dttm AS cmt_up_dttm,
COMMENT cmt JOIN USER u ON (cmt.user_id = u.id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (id, content_type, content_id, user_id, body, status, reg_dttm, up_dttm) VALUE (#{id}, #{contentType}, #{contentId}, #{user.id}, #{body}, 'SERVICE', NOW(), NOW());
INSERT INTO COMMENT_META (content_type, content_id, count) VALUE (#{contentType}, #{contentId}, 1);
